mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trip_record WHERE trip_save = 'T2' AND trip_disclose = '01'

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM(SELECT * FROM trip_record t LEFT OUTER JOIN attached_file a ON t.post_id = a.post_id WHERE trip_save = 'T2' AND trip_disclose = '01' ORDER BY t.post_id DESC) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start } AND #{end }

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM(SELECT * FROM trip_record WHERE end_day > sysdate AND trip_save='T1' AND writer_id = #{tripVO.writerId} ORDER BY regist_day DESC) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{pagingVO.start } AND #{pagingVO.end }

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM(SELECT * FROM trip_record WHERE end_day > sysdate AND trip_save='T2' AND writer_id = #{tripVO.writerId} ORDER BY regist_day DESC) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{pagingVO.start } AND #{pagingVO.end }

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM(SELECT * FROM trip_record WHERE end_day < sysdate AND writer_id = #{tripVO.writerId} ORDER BY regist_day DESC) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{pagingVO.start } AND #{pagingVO.end }
SELECT writer_id, trip_title, start_day, end_day, regist_day, post_id FROM trip_record WHERE post_id = #{postId}
SELECT m.trip_date , m.content FROM trip_record t JOIN trip_record_memo m ON t.post_id = m.post_id WHERE t.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY m.trip_date

SELECT m.map_no , m.map_id , m.map_name , m.map_lat , m.map_lng , m.trip_date , m.post_id FROM map m JOIN trip_record t ON m.post_id = t.post_id WHERE t.post_id = #{postId} AND TO_CHAR(m.trip_date) = #{tripDate} ORDER BY m.trip_date, m.map_no
